ygData.subject: Wolf playing opossum

(Thank you again Yanshosh typical predictable bad guy move.)

Lunarpine waits for Slayer to get closer. he sees the rifle aimed at him
once again. "Just a little closer he thinks watching the other wolfbots
movements carefully.

The maximal leapt back to his feat as Slayer pulled the trigger,
transforming to his half transformation he uses a sonic howl at Slayer. He
knew his howl couldn't cause any lasting damage but it could disrupt his
senses long enough for Lunarpine to get close enough to use his claws.

In his half wolf state his internal repairs would begin and hopefully his
tactics would give him the advantage he needed to destroy the traitor before
any more secrets fell into Prebons hands. He knew Striker well enough to
hold his own in a fight, there was a good chance that Slayer fought with the
same style. Slayer still didn't know that the wolf he was fighting was the
once lesser wolf named Lunarpine, and now Slayer was going to learn that
Lunarpine was more than more than meets the eye.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 5:37 AM
Subject: Re: Yanosh don't leave me hangin


> ::Slayer::
>
> Slayer laughs, watching Lunarping fall to the ground. Slayer gliding
> in closer, his shoulder blasters take aim again.
>
> He hesitates before firing again, unable to give the command to
> destroy this bot. What was wrong with him? Why couldn't he kill a
> normal Maximal?
>
> Roaring in frustration, Slayer aims a laser rifle at Lunarpine,
> clenching his fists as hard as he could to pull the trigger, bolts
> streaming out toward Lunarpine.
>
>
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > "Fool, I do compare to the pit!" Slayer growls
> >
> > Lunarpine laughed. that was the first thing the two wolves agreed
> on since
> > Slayer was Striker. Lunarpine crossed his claws again blocking the
> lasers
> > Slayer fired at him.
> > "I agree, you are like the Pit, you keep going on without end. but
> enough
> > about your talking I'm still waiting for you to atack. Or is this
> the best
> > you got?"
> >
> > Lunarpine soon ate his words as a missle struck his crossed claws
> knocking
> > him off balance. A second missle struck him in the shoulder causing
> a gaping
> > rip in his frame. The bot stumbled to the ground holding his wound.
> > Lunarpine knew that beast mode would heal him but would leave him
> vulnerable
> > for another attack. he had to stay in bot mode to fight. Slayer was
> > hesitating, Lunarpine didn't know for sure why but decided to act
> instead of
> > dwell on it.
> >
> > The wolfbot curled up trying to protect the wound. "Come on
> toughbot live up
> > to your name. Prove how tough you are. FINISH ME or I'll come
> looking for
> 545846> you, I have your scent and I WILL FIND YOU!!!"
>
>
>
>
>
